channel.title: Adding custom items? =D

item.title: Adding custom items? =D
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

I tried adding “16000” (the ID of my item just to try it), i added it to the item.cfg:

item = 16000	Dragon_Platebody			WEEW			10100000	10100000	10100000	24	44	34	-10	0	194	194	204	0	194	34	34

Added to the item.java

[code] public static int platebody[] = {

    16000, 14523, 14527, 14531, 14503, 14507, 14538,
    14540, 14542, 14544, 14546, 14548, 14550, 14553, 14554, 
    14555, 14556, 14557, 14531, 14512, 15348, 5032, 5028, 6065,
    1844, 5034, 6750, 6617, 5575, 7399, 6322, 6139, 6133, 6129, 7390, 7392,
    6916, 1035, 540, 5553, 4757, 1833, 1835, 6388, 6384, 1355, 4111, 4101,
    4091, 6186, 6184, 6180, 3058, 4509, 4504, 4069, 4728, 4736, 4712, 6107,
    2661, 3140, 1115, 1117, 1119, 1121, 1123, 1125, 1127, 2583, 2591, 2599,
    2607, 2615, 2623, 2653, 2669, 3481, 4720, 4728, 4749, 2661, 426, 3387,
    7695, 544, 7689, 7660, 7670, 7661, 7669, 7698, 7642, 546 };[/code]

And to my client:

if(i == 16000) //spawn id(item) // change to w.e u want { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 10394; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 926; class8.anInt174 = 6582; class8.anInt181 = 1260; class8.anInt190 = 464; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 4; class8.anInt165 = 6670; class8.anInt200 = 6698; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon platebody"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Dragon platebody.".getBytes(); }

Now, i see it and everything, but i wear it as a weapon

How do i fix?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2009, 05:47:34 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?
